ADD_EXECUTABLE(Demo04_Raycasting demo04.cpp OgreNewtonApplication.cpp OgreNewtonFrameListener.cpp)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Demo04_Raycasting ${OGRE_LIBRARIES} ${CEGUI_LIBRARIES} ${OGRENEWT_LIBRARIES} ${OIS_LIBRARIES} ${CEGUIOGRE_LIBRARIES})

#INSTALL(TARGETS Demo04_Raycasting RUNTIME DESTINATION ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/bin)
